author: Reuters
title: GREECE CRISIS-Latest news
text:
July 6 The following is the latest news related to the Greek debt crisis and the country's overwhelming vote to reject the bailout offer from its international creditors (all times GMT):
0812 - U.S.-listed shares of National Bank of Greece are down 15 percent in pre-market trading.
0811 - Italy's top official for European Union affairs calls for Greece and its creditors to resume negotiations with an increased willingness to compromise.
0728 - Greece's chief negotiator in bailout talks Euclid Tsakalotos is the Greek government's top candidate to be finance minister after the resignation of Yanis Varoufakis, a government official says.
